thread.title: Kelly Ripa Wishes Husband Mark Consuelos Happy Birthday With Sweet Throwback Photos
thread.title_full: Kelly Ripa Wishes Husband Mark Consuelos Happy Birthday With Sweet Throwback Photos

author: Latifah Muhammad
title: Kelly Ripa Wishes Husband Mark Consuelos Happy Birthday With Sweet Throwback Photos
text: Kelly Ripa Wishes Husband Mark Consuelos Happy Birthday With Sweet Throwback Photos by Latifah Muhammad 7:18 PM PDT, March 30, 2017 Playing Kelly Ripa Wishes Husband Mark Consuelos Happy Birthday With Sweet Throwback Photos Birthday love! Kelly Ripa gushed over her husband, Mark Consuelos, in a sweet post celebrating the actor's 46th birthday on Thursday. RELATED: Kelly Ripa and Mark Consuelos Look Adorable in All Black on Date Night -- See the Pics! The Live! With Kelly host commemorated her hubby's big day with a gallery of throwback photos featuring the duo, as well as their children, Michael, 19, Lola, 15, and Joaquin, 14. "Happy birthday @instasuelos! The best father, husband, friend and regenerator a person could know!!! I love you," Ripa captioned the post. A post shared by Kelly Ripa (@kellyripa) on Mar 30, 2017 at 8:37am PDT WATCH: Kelly Ripa Clarifies Comments That Mark Consuelos is 'Mean' After Sex: 'I Was Joking!' The cute couple, who met on the set of All My Children , tied the knot in 1996, and they've been inseparable ever since. Aside from co-hosting Live! alongside his wife, Consuelos has no shame in admitting that he's still "crazy" over the 46-year-old talk show host. "We really dig each other," the Pitch star said during an appearance on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen last September . "I'm really crazy about her." See more below.
